author: vmassol
msg: Modified the authentication to use the connection helper factory instead of hard coding it to use the HttpClient connection helper. Thus we can now also use the Jdk HttpURLConnection connection helper or any other for that matter.

author: vmassol
msg: * Big refactoring (hope I haven't broken anything): cleaned up the Cactus Configuration classes
* Fixed the FormAuthentication class so that it works with any web redirector (and not only with ServletTestCase)

author: vmassol
msg: new test to verify a jsessionid cookie is returned when a new http session is created

author: vmassol
msg: New WebResponse.getCookieIgnoreCase(cookieName) to get the first cookie matching cookieName whatever the case (case-insensitive).
